function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Bibliometric analysis to understand the publications related to contagious diseases may overlook important insights and trends.","Impact":"Missed insights can lead to ineffective strategies for addressing contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Incorporate additional qualitative and contextual analysis to supplement the bibliometric approach.","Technologies":"Data mining and natural language processing for deeper analysis of publication content.","People":"Researchers, practitioners, and public health officials utilizing the analysis.","Owner":"Research teams and organizations conducting the analysis."},{"Description":"Failure to consider the impact of global events (such as COVID-19) on the research landscape may result in outdated or incomplete insights.","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of the current state of research and its implications for contagious disease management.","Mitigation":"Regularly update the analysis to reflect changes in the research landscape due to global events.","Technologies":"Real-time data monitoring and dynamic visualization tools for tracking trends.","People":"Researchers, practitioners, and public health officials utilizing the analysis.","Owner":"Research teams and organizations conducting the analysis."},{"Description":"Bias in the selection of data sources for the bibliometric analysis may skew the interpretation of research trends and priorities.","Impact":"Misrepresentation of the most discussed topics and a skewed understanding of the research landscape.","Mitigation":"Use diverse and comprehensive databases for data collection to ensure a balanced representation of research.","Technologies":"Advanced search algorithms and database integration for comprehensive data gathering.","People":"Researchers, data scientists, and information specialists involved in data collection.","Owner":"Research teams and organizations conducting the analysis."}]}
